text: Amire Bi Gazand () means Harmless Ruler is the eighth official studio album by Iranian singer Mohsen Chavoshi.Mohsen Chavoshi - 'Amire Bi Gazand' The album is a record for the most downloads in Persian music.ثبت رکورد تازه دانلود غیرقانونی موسیقی به نام محسن چاوشی == Track listing == ==See also== * Rumi * Saadi Shirazi ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 albums Category:Mohsen Chavoshi albums
title: Harmless Ruler
